ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Davis,Wally Wood,Will Elder,Bill Elder,Jack Davis,Wally Wood
ComicInfo.Summary:
Poopeye!: Poopeye beats up other comic strongmen hired by the broccoli king to get rid of Poopeye.
Slow Motion!: A look at what might be happening in various sports if they were recorded by a slow motion camera.
Comic Book Ads!: Parody ads for "How To Hypnotize", "Get Prizes...Make Money", "Rubber Bubble Gum", "Tromp Stamps Co.", "Ded Ryder Cowboy Carbine", and "Alwett Physical Training Course."
Under The Waterfront!: Everyone Terry knows is killed by John Friendly's thugs.
ComicInfo.Tags: Wimpy,Superduperman,Popeye,Olive Oyl,Li'l Abner,Alfred E. Neuman,Mammy Yokum,Swee'Pea,Tarzan
ComicInfo.Title: Poopeye!; Slow Motion!; Comic Book Ads!; Under The Waterfront!
